snippet.title: [ORIGINAL SONG] Drink Your Light | AmaLee
snippet.description:
AmaLee's Original song "Drink Your Light" from her debut album Rise of the Monarch 
🦋 STREAM/DOWNLOAD (Spotify, iTunes, etc) ▶ https://ffm.to/RiseoftheMonarch 
🛍️ CDs + MERCH SHOP 🛍️ ➜ https://shop.leeandlie.com ✦

"Rise of the Monarch" is my DEBUT ORIGINAL ALBUM, featuring 8 songs telling the story and lore of my villainous vtuber, Monarch. Dark Pop, Edgy, Villainous Vibes, this album is the perfect soundtrack to blast while you embrace your villain arc..

✦ Full Monarch Lore Video HERE ▶ https://youtu.be/TZZNBKEjdK0 ✦

Credits:
✧ Written & Performed by AmaLee
✧ Co-written, produced, mixed & mastered by Shawn Christmas
✧ "Rise of the Monarch" Album Art by LucidSky
✧ Art by Cecile (theCecilz) 
✧ Video Animation by SAKI.EXE

▶︎ WANT TO USE THIS COVER SONG? ▶︎
For non-profit use only. You’ll see a sound recording claim from Studio71 on my behalf, but you won't be issued a strike. Please credit and link back to this video in the description.
